author: Deccan
title: Krishna Shroff gets in to the 'mood' of posing topless again! | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 17, 2015, 16.09 pm Mumbai: Krishna Shroff, is at it again! Just weeks after creating an online frenzy with a series of ‘topless’ pictures, Jackie Shroff’s daughter is up for round two. The young celeb kid, who was rumoured to be making her Bollywood debut, shared another bareback monochrome picture of herself through her photo sharing app. In a previous interview, Krishna said that the pictures were a part of her photographer friend’s project to capture the ‘mood of the moment’. This new picture that was captioned ‘Mood’, is also believed to be a part of the same photoshoot. Also Read: Jackie Shroff's daughter Krishna shares pictures from bold photo shoot Daddy Jackie said in an interview that he believes his children were brought up the right way, hence found no need to answer for them as he felt ‘comfortable with whatever they did’.
